info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 2: Client Logos
info.description: Client logo bar with 6 placeholder logos (grayscale, color on hover) plus 3 trust stats below: 50,000+ Factories, 44 Years, Thai RD Certified.
divi_modules_used: et_pb_row (1/6 x6 for logos, 1/3 x3 for stats)
et_pb_image (6 client logos with grayscale filter)
notes: Replace /logos/client-N.png with actual client logos after import
Logo images use filter_saturate=0% + filter_opacity=60% for grayscale effect
Stats row has top border to separate from logos
